@@ -1,1616 +0,0 @@
-from abc import ABC, abstractmethod%0A%0Aclass Animal(ABC):%0A    def __init__(self, nome: str):%0A        self.nome = nome%0A%0A    def getNome(self):%0A        return self.nome%0A    %0A    @abstractmethod%0A    def apresentar_nome(self) -%3E str:%0A        pass%0A%0A    @abstractmethod%0A    def fazer_som(self) -%3E str:%0A        pass%0A%0A    @abstractmethod%0A    def mover(self) -%3E str:%0A        pass%0A%0Adef apresentar(animal: Animal):%0A    print(animal.apresentar_nome())%0A    print(animal.fazer_som())%0A    print(animal.mover())%0A%0Aclass Leao(Animal):%0A    def __init__(self, nome: str):%0A        super().__init__(nome)%0A%0A    def apresentar_nome(self):%0A        return f%22Eu sou um(a) %3C%7Bself.getNome()%7D%3E%22%0A    %0A    def fazer_som(self):%0A        return %22RAWWWWRRR%22%0A    %0A    def mover(self):%0A        return %22Cuidado nao viu, que esse leao ta com fome%22%0A    %0Aclass Coruja(Animal):%0A    def __init__(self, nome: str):%0A        super().__init__(nome)%0A%0A    def apresentar_nome(self):%0A        return f%22Eu sou um(a) %3C%7Bself.getNome()%7D%3E%22%0A    %0A    def fazer_som(self):%0A        return %22u%22%0A    %0A    def mover(self):%0A        return %22As asas batem silenciosamente%22%0A    %0Aclass Girafa(Animal):%0A    def __init__(self, nome: str):%0A        super().__init__(nome)%0A%0A    def apresentar_nome(self):%0A        return f%22Eu sou um(a) %3C%7Bself.getNome()%7D%3E%22%0A    %0A    def fazer_som(self):%0A        return %22(barulhos de girafa)%22%0A    %0A    def mover(self):%0A        return %22(barulhos de corrida de girafa)%22%0A    %0Aanimais: list%5BAnimal%5D = %5BLeao(%22Leao%22), Coruja(%22Coruja%22), Girafa(%22Girafa%22)%5D%0A%0Afor animal in animais:%0A    print(animal.apresentar_nome())%0A    print(animal.fazer_som())%0A    print(animal.mover())
